#summary Description of the TouScruino

== Features ==

<a href="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/TouScruinoT.jpg">
<img src="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/TouScruinoT.jpg" width="400"><a><img src="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/blank.jpg"><a href="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/TouScruinoB.jpg">
<img src="http://ardurct.googlecode.com/svn/images/TouScruinoB.jpg" width="340"><a>

 * 240x320 2.8'' TFT screen capable of displaying 262k colors. With controlable backlight.
 * Touch panel on the whole surface of the screen.
 * Arduino compatible bootloader with FTDI compatible connector to upgrade the firmware. This requires an FTDI cable or an off board. If the TouScruino is plugged into a [RCShield], it can be recharged and firmware upgraded through the USB plug of the RCShield.
 * Uses an Atmega1284P, which has:
  * 12 more pins than the Atmega328. The TFT screen and the touch panels can be controlled by the processor without having to use the pins used by Arduino shields (D11, D12 and D13 have to be used for SPI though).
  * an additional serial port: Serial1 (RX1=D2, TX1=D3). An XBee can be connected at the same time as a USB bridge.
  * 128K of usable flash memory, 4K of EEPROM and 16K of RAM.
